author: Special Correspondent
text:
The IIPE Laxmi Raman Matriculation Higher Secondary School here will conduct a free awareness programme on civil service examinations on Saturday (January 23).

An official statement said professors from various colleges will speak in the programme which will be organised on the school premises from 9 a.m.

Students of classes 9 to 12 from Tirunelveli, Tuticorin and Kanyakumari districts can participate in the programme after producing their identity cards.

For more details, students may contact 73730 88826 or 75980 38095, the statement said.
title: Awareness programme
